discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACD
on page 71 of SAM manual that came with SAM course:
A - Purchased rights should be greater than 0
C - Publisher Part Number and Software Model not found
D - Duplicate Entry

questions.question_text: Which of the following are valid on import errors (vs. after import) when using the automated entitlement import feature? (Choose three.)

choices.B: The end date must be greater than the start date
choices.A: Purchased rights should be greater than 0
choices.C: Publisher Part Number and Software Model not found

choices.B: Reject – ignores the suggestion. The next time the scheduled job is executed, it will not pick the same package or rule that was rejected previously
choices.C: Save – allows you to save the suggestion to review again later
choices.E: Create – creates a discovery model with suggested values
choices.D: Ignore – ignores the suggestion. All fields are updated to read only until the next time the job is executed with the same package or rule that was ignored previously.
choices.A: Accept – updates the discovery model with suggested values

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
sys_ui_action for table "samp_normalization_suggestion" offers only "Reject" & "Accept"

Selected Answer: AB
a,b is the right answer
I agree with A and B - it is either Accept or Reject.

questions.question_text: What are the available actions associated with the Normalization Suggestions feature? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Should be A , Software Discovery model

questions.question_text: What is used to identify and normalize software installed in an environment?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACE
I actually think it's A,C,E: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/c_SAMContentService.html

Transform Maps I thought only applied to existing SN tables?: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/tokyo-platform-administration/page/script/server-scripting/concept/c_CreatingNewTransformMaps.html

questions.question_text: When a software title is transferred between vendors, the content library download and update feature will automatically propagate those changes to which of the following? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
From page 109 in SAM book that was included in SAM course:
B. To avoid duplication of data
E. To ensure that if all fields do not match an existing record on import, that a new record is created

questions.question_text: When creating a transform map to map software installation data into the appropriate SAM table, why would you set the coalesce values for the u_display_name. u_publisher, u_version, u_installed_on, and u_assigned_to fields to be true? (Choose two.)

choices.A: To ensure that you import all these fields into the table
choices.E: To ensure that if all fields do not match an existing record on import, that a new record is created
choices.D: To ensure that if all fields match an existing record on import, that a new record is created
